amendment.description: At the end of subtitle F of title XI, add the following: SEC. 11613. WATERS OF THE UNITED STATES RULE. The final rule issued by the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency and the Secretary of the Army entitled "Clean Water Rule: Definition of 'Waters of the United States'", published on June 29, 2015 (80 Fed. Reg. 37054), is repealed, and any regulation or policy revised under, or otherwise affected as a result of, that rule shall be applied as if that rule had not been issued.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 31 printed in House Report 115-679 to repeal the final rule issued by the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency and the Secretary of the Army entitled "Clean Water Rule: Definition of Waters of the United States" (80 Fed. Reg. 37053 (June 29, 2015)).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Banks (IN) amendment (A048) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 173 (Roll no. 203).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A048) offered by Mr. Banks (IN).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Banks (IN) amendment (A048) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 173 (Roll no. 203).
